title: Blood in Fur
description: ZOOTOPIA meets THE SILENCE OF THE LAMBS. A retired police dog named Leonard gets called in to hunt the deranged psychopath. Leo enlists the help of a young human male, Ed to help him-the two are thrust into a dark and vile investigation that will change their lives-if they make it out alive. This psychological crime thriller featuring talking animals is anything but kid friendly and is unlike anything most have read.
author: J.A.  Flynn
